惷字的基本解释

惷
chǔn
同“蠢”。

惷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chǔn］
［《廣韻》尺尹切，上準，昌。］
(1)骚动。
(2)愚蠢。

惷字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惷； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页392第33
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?尺尹切，音蠢。【說文】亂也。从心春聲。通作蠢。【左傳·昭二十四年】鄭子太叔曰：今王室實惷惷焉。【註】惷惷，動擾貌。今俗本作蠢。◎按周禮司刺，三赦曰惷愚。惷字乃丑江，丑用二切，謂生而癡騃，與不識異義者，在三赦之內也。與憃字不同。字彙引周禮惷愚於此惷字之下，誤。憃，chōnɡ，愚也。

惷字的源字形

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [chǔn]
["Guangyun" Chi Yinqie, Shangzhun, Chang. ]

stupid
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　 Stupid; Kangxi strokes: 13; Page number: page 392 33
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui]? Chi Yin cut, the sound is stupid. [Said Wen] Chaos too. From the heart of spring. All foolish. [Zuo Chuan·Twenty-fourth Year of Zhao] Uncle Zheng Zi said: The royal family is really stupid today. [Note] Stupid, disturbing appearance. Today's vulgar is stupid. ◎According to Zhou Lisi, Sanxian is stupid and stupid. The stupid word is ugly, and ugly is used in two ways. It means that people who are born with dementia and those who don't know the difference are also within the sanctuary. It is different from 憃字. The vocabulary cited Zhou Li to be stupid under this stupid word, and it was wrong. Sad, chōnɡ, foolishness.
